roleset.name: cause to be in motion, summon to arms, be in motion
roleset.note: MOBILIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mobilize' based on sentence in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. No comparison. (from mobilize.01-v predicate notes)
MOBILIZING-J NOTES: Roleset based on Thyme instances. Framed by Claire, comparison to mobilize.01 (from mobilizing.01-j)

roles.note: Like other motion verbs, when an animate entity is mobilizing itself, the subject is arg0. See example. (from mobilizing.01-j)

example.name: only example so far
example.text: So far, [Wall Street's Old Guard]-1 seems to be winning the program-trading battle, *trace*-1 successfully mobilizing public and congressional opinion to bludgeon their tormentors.

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: Their mobilization of the army required better roads than were constructed previously.

example.name: Dir for starting point and Gol for end point
example.text: Only two subjects consumed dietary supplements for calcium, and their mobilization of lead from the skeleton to the blood was the lowest of all the subjects.

example.name: Mover, moved in one animate entity = Arg0
example.text: Husband advised that someone should be close contact whenever pt. is mobilizing .

roleset.name: movable
roleset.note: MOBILE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SHARP. Relation to mobilize.01 (from mobile.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: fingers and thumb warm , pink , mobile and sensate , mildly TTP at distal radius fracture site with palmar and wrist bruising resolved .
